name: Nancy Drew: The Curse of Blackmoor Manor
name_original: Nancy Drew: The Curse of Blackmoor Manor
description:
Nancy Drew: The Curse of Blackmoor Manor is an adventure game developed by HeR Interactive. It was originally released in 2004. Atari published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Nancy Drew: The Curse of Blackmoor Manor on PC.
